title: I dreamed that I was standing in front of a mirror

preview.html: I dreamed of standing in front of a mirror in a dream via the website roy2a.com, a person stands in front of a mirror to see his reflection and modify his appearance, as is used on a daily basis, and there are many interpretations of seeing a mirror and its interpretations in a dream, and today through this article we will present to you I dreamed that I was standing in front of a mirror in relation to For great translators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Kathir, and other dream interpretation scholars, follow us according to the condition of the dreamer, whether she is single, married, or pregnant. I dreamed that I was standing in front of mirrors in a dream. Seeing yourself standing in front of mirrors and looking at them in a dream indicates that the dreamer is a person of good morals and distinguished by good character. And behavior among men, and God knows best. Standing in front of mirrors and looking at them in a dream may indicate that the dreamer feels dissatisfied with his life and what is happening in it, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a mirror in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explained his vision of looking at mirrors and his face was beautiful in the dream. It indicates achieving Something in the dreamer's life that he was seeking. Jumping in the mirror and his face was ugly in the dream indicates that the dreamer is going through a difficult period full of financial problems. Seeing a traveler looking at mirrors in a dream indicates that he will soon return to his homeland and meet his family. Looking at broken mirrors in a dream indicates... That some unpleasant things will happen in the dreamer’s life soon, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing looking in mirrors in a dream for a single woman. Seeing in a dream a single woman looking in mirrors indicates that she will establish a romantic relationship with a good and elegant person. Looking in mirrors in a dream for a single woman indicates a lot It is good news in her life in the near future. Seeing an unmarried woman looking in mirrors and her appearance is beautiful in a dream. This indicates that he will get married soon, and God knows best. Looking at broken mirrors in a single woman’s dream indicates separation from someone dear to her, and God knows best. Seeing one person being given For him in a dreamIt bodes well for the coming season, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a woman looking in mirrors in a dreamSeeing a married woman looking in the mirror and her face was beautiful in a dream announces that this year of her life will be full of happy events and God knows best. He looked in the mirror and the face was beautiful in a married dreamAs It indicates that God will carry her soon, and God knows best. Seeing a married woman looking at mirrors in a dream also indicates the extent of the relationship of harmony and understanding between her and her husband. Interpretation of a dream about looking in mirrors for a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant woman looking in the mirror and her face was beautiful in a dream announces that she will give birth to a boy, and God knows best. Looking at mirrors in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates getting rid of her distress and freeing her from all the worries and problems she is going through. Seeing a pregnant woman looking at broken mirrors in a dream indicates that she is going through a difficult period of pregnancy and feels very tired, and God knows best. Looking in the mirror in a pregnant woman’s dream also indicates She will live a period full of happiness and joy as she impatiently awaits her child. Yes

title: The 50 most important interpretations of a dream about a burning fire by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The interpretation of a dream about a burning fire frightens those who see this dream. His belief that it brings them a lot of fear and anxiety, because a burning fire in reality means a lot of loss of life and money, especially if he sees his house burning or finds someone he loves burning, and here we learn in all the explanations that scholars have come.Interpretation of a dream about burning firesWhat is the interpretation of a dream about burning fire When a person sees a burning fire in a dream, he is in the process of searching for its meaning to reassure his heart or take care of it. In fact, this dream has some positive interpretations because it carries many negative interpretations and we have come to you with brief interpretations through several points: If one has power and has a large business and trade, but in reality he does not investigate the legality and does not pay attention to the source of his profits, so that he only wants Increasing his money, the dream here is a warning to him that the forbidden person eats the law and goes with it, and he must clean up his money and get rid of it, as it is forbidden. As for the woman who knows what she is doing and what distinguishes her arbitrary qualities, when she sees a fire burning in her house, she must beware of God’s wrath upon her and fear God. On her husband, her children, and herself before everyone else. So that they will not be exposed to the torment of the fire of Hell. Good news for the unmarried young man who is in a dark place in a dream, and there is a burning fire that sends his light to him so that he can feel his way in this darkness, because he will marry a good girl who will do that. Help him obey him and give him the blessing of a woman. Whoever finds that he uses her for heating and is comfortable with her burning and does not want to go out, in fact, he loves his wife very much and comforts her and believes that God has blessed him with her presence in his life. Thus, we find many differences in meanings depending on the dreamer’s feelings, his psychological state in reality, and the extent of his satisfaction with himself and his actions. What is the interpretation of a dream about a burning fire according to Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin did not differ much in that a person’s dream of a burning fire can have different meanings depending on what is going on. In the details of his life. Seeing the house of one of his acquaintances burning is a sign that this person is a sinner and the ruler must have a role to guide him and lead him to the path of truth. The comforting light emanating from the fire in the dream of the man who owns the house and the children is evidence that he lives in a state of psychological and familial stability with... His wife and there are a lot of hot feelings between them. He said: It is evidence of the dreamer’s sins and disobedience that he should avoid and repent for what he lost in his life in an atmosphere of sins. If the light resulting from the burning of a fire fills the house with light, it is a sign of legitimate earning and abundant profit, which raises his status. The dreamer is among the people and spends from it in the outlets of God Almighty. ) has begun. Are you confused about something and do not find an explanation that reassures you? Google search has been activated Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site.Interpretation of a dream of burning fires for a single woman. In a dream of a girl who desires to soon become the wife of one of the loyal men with whom she feels comfortable and safe, we find that the interpretation of the dream indicates the fulfillment of this desire that the girl wants and who is about to receive good news. Who comes to ask for her hand in marriage. Some commentators said that the girl...

title: Ibn Sirin’s interpretations of seeing feces in a dream

preview.html: Stool in a dream, there is no doubt that seeing feces or excrement seems disgusting, suspicious and disgusting to many of us, but the indications surrounding it vary between satisfaction and hatred, and this is determined by the condition of the seer and the details of the vision. Stool can be solid or liquid, and defecation can be done alone or in front of people. It can be in a known or unknown place, and in this article we take a look at all the cases and indications with more details and explanations. Stool in a dream Seeing feces or defecation expresses getting out of hardships and hardships, removing distress and anxiety, dispelling worries, and healing from ailments and ailments. It is a symbol of relief in many cases because what comes out of the abdomen means the death of someone who disturbs life and turns the soul. And whoever has money and sees that he is defecating, he pays the zakat of his money and gives charity, but frequent defecation or excrement is evidence of the difficulty and disorder of things, and this is if the seer is traveling or intending to do so. Therefore, even if he defecates in a known place, he spends his money greedily. As for if he defecates in an unknown place, he takes out his money for lust, and spends it with others for guidance, and whoever defecates and hides his favor, or hides his money, or saves it for something, and the situation is an argument. Healing from illness and meeting needs and almost relief. If the smell of feces is bad, this indicates misery and the pain of living desires that have no basis, and defecation according to Al-Nabulsi is evidence of repentance and forgiveness of sins if a person does not defecate. Feces in a dream according to Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin sees that what comes out of the stomach indicates money and livelihood, and that defecation symbolizes getting out of hardships and getting rid of worries and sorrows. Among the symbols of seeing feces is that it indicates lack of morals, bad morals, a stimulant, and bad speech. It is a symbol of waste and spending money to satisfy desires and whims, and it also translates into illicit intercourse, distance from instinct, and violation of the pillars of the law. Feces also express what a person keeps to himself and does not reveal, such as his secrets and private life, and it can indicate a long journey and exit from the experience, if the defecation is in a suitable place or in the right place, as well as if it does not smell bad or come from damage. Whoever witnesses defecation, then throws out his money for some reason, realizes what it is, such as a fine, or redressing injustice to one of them. Feces in a single woman’s dream The vision of defecation and defecation symbolizes the release of worries and anxiety, changing the situation, and achieving demands and desires. Excretion in front of people can be interpreted as bragging, boasting, and exposure to envy, and whoever sees that he is excreting, spends money on something that brings her pleasure and comfort, and solid waste indicates difficulty and difficulty in reaping desires and achieving goals. If the smell of feces is bad, this indicates waste and squandering of opportunities and wasting money on useless things, so the vision Based on rumors that people are wandering around for her and insulting her, and whoever sees that he defecates and excretes. Excretes feces, this is an indication of relieving need and gaining comfort and pleasure. Feces in a dream for a married woman expresses the vision of

title: Interpretation of a chicken in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Chicken in a dream Chicken is one of the famous birds that have been on earth for thousands of years and is considered one of the domesticated animals that people have been able to benefit from a lot over the years. What does chicken mean in a dream? Chicken in a dream is one of the dreams that generally indicate goodness and there are many interpretations, including: Seeing many chickens in a dream indicates good things that will happen to the dreamer and that he will find a great improvement in his financial conditions. Peeling chicken in a dream is evidence that the dreamer does bad things and does not fear God in his actions, and this will cause him to fall into major crises. If the dreamer sees a dead chicken while cooking it, this means that bad events will bite him and his mental state will be unstable. Cutting chicken in a dream symbolizes that the dreamer will go through a difficult stage in his life and success will be his ally in the coming period. Chicken in a dream by Ibn Sirin Imam Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a chicken in a dream is a good dream that shows that God will help a person get rid of his worries in life. If you are sick and see a chicken in a dream, this indicates that God - the Most High - will save you and soon relieve you of pain and your health will improve. If the dreamer sees a live chicken In a dream, this is a sign that he will hear good news in the coming period. Chicken in a dream Al-Nabulsi Imam Al-Nabulsi has many opinions about seeing a chicken in a dream, and it generally indicates that the dreamer will come to him with kindness, and that he does good deeds. If a woman sees a chicken in her dream, this means that she is a woman who does a lot of work and takes care of young orphans. However, if the dreamer is in good health and sees a chicken entering his place in a dream, this indicates that he will suffer from a health problem, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees many chickens in his house, this is good news of good luck, wealth, and improvement in material conditions. Catching chickens in a dream symbolizes that the seer will get a lot of money in the coming period. What is the interpretation of seeing chickens in a single person’s dream? Seeing chickens in a single person’s dream, especially if they are in large quantities, means that the Creator has written good for her and there will be many good changes in her life. If an unmarried woman is studying and sees a lot of chickens in a dream, this indicates that she will excel in her studies and reach high ranks. The interpretation of a chicken in a dream for an engaged single woman is good news that this marriage will be good and that God He will bless her in her husband and in her life. Success, success and psychological stability will be the ally of the girl who sees herself eating cooked chicken in a dream. What is the interpretation of eating grilled chicken in a single dream? Eating chicken in a single dream is generally a sign of good and positive things that will be the dreamer's lot and that God will write her distinction in her practical life and stability in her emotional life. But if the girl sees grilled chicken in a dream, this means that she will face some problems after hearing bad news. If the girl is engaged and dreams of eating grilled chicken, this

title: Learn the interpretation of a dream about offering food to a dead person from Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about offering food to the dead: This dream is considered one of the dreams that many people constantly repeat, as it varies according to the dreamer’s social status, the circumstances surrounding him, and the state of the food, whether it is healthy or spoiled. Interpretation of a dream about offering food to the dead by Ibn Sirin. What is the interpretation of a dream about delivering the dead to the living? Giving the dead to the living In a dream, eating good-tasting and delicious food in a dream is a good thing for its owner and indicates the abundance of sustenance and the happy and comfortable life in which he will live. If the dead person’s food for the living contains honey, then this is a sign of the happy days that await him, the goodness and blessings that he will receive in his life, and that all his sorrows And his worries will soon go away. If the dead give the living a watermelon, then this vision is not worthy of praise, and shows many sorrows and worries that will find him. If the food that the dead gives to the living is spoiled and inedible, this is a sign that the dreamer gets his money through illegal means. Location Egyptian, the largest site specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just type Egyptian Dream Interpretation Site on Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about offering food to the dead by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin explained that seeing a dead person’s gift in a dream is generally an indication that goodness is imminent for the dreamer in the coming days. Seeing a dead person giving live meat that is ripe and tastes good means that the dreamer will obtain goodness and blessings in his life, but if the meat is rotten and emits an unpleasant odor, this means that something bad is happening. Such as a misfortune or plot that befalls the dreamer and causes him harm and evil. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that the dead person is offering her wheat, this is a sign that she will marry a good, God-fearing young man. Interpretation of a dream about offering food to the dead for a single womanWhen an unmarried girl sees in a dream that the deceased is offering her Candy, this is a sign that she will get everything she was trying to achieve and that she will live a happy and stable life. If a girl sees that a dead person gave her good food and she took from it, this indicates that she will receive a lot of good news that will happen in her life and change it for the better. In the event that he rejects him Taking a gift from the deceased, this vision is considered undesirable and indicates that he will live days full of worries, sorrow and failure. Interpretation of a dream about feeding the dead for a married woman: Seeing the deceased giving a married woman good-tasting food in a dream explains the extent of stability in which she lives and that God will bless her with an abundance of goodness and the poor. The outlook is not good if the dead person’s food that you offer her is spoiled and inedible, as this indicates the tribulations that this woman will fall into. If a dead person offers her food, but she does not know about it, this is a sign that God will answer an old prayer that she was praying for, Or he will satisfy her old desire. Interpretation of a dream about a dead person giving food to a pregnant woman. The interpretation that the deceased gives a pregnant woman food during her sleep does not differ from previous interpretations. Good health. If the food is not good, this is a sign

title: The 50 most important interpretations of a dream about a dog biting a dog in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a dog biting a dog in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about a dog biteIt is known that there are many people who are interested in raising dogs because they are loyal to their owner, but any problem can happen to this dog when it is not vaccinated, causing it to bite anyone it sees. It has many warnings to the dreamer that we understand by knowing the opinion of the majority of jurists. What is the interpretation of a dream of a dog bite? The interpretation of a dream of a dog bite leads to some losses in life, perhaps in the aspect of work that affects the dreamer financially, so he must quickly look for another job to be able to Meeting his needs. Seeing a dog bite in a dream means canceling the engagement or failing to consummate the relationship in the first place. Maybe the next relationship will be better, so there should be optimism and not despair or sadness. If the dog that bites the dreamer belongs to him, then this is a good sign of his abundant food and his gaining enormous benefits that will get him out of all his crises. Seeing a dog bite can lead to a bad psychological state As a result of the dreamer or his children being exhausted, and nothing will get him out of it except praying to God Almighty for healing and mercy. A dog bite can lead to regret that the dreamer did not complete something and realize his mistake after a long time, so he must always take responsibility and stay away from any harmful path even He reaches the path of repentance and a comfortable life in it. The coming period. A dog bite may indicate that the dreamer will be robbed. There are some people whom he trusts, but they carry grudges and hatred in their hearts, so he must pay attention to these people. If the vision is of a widow, it expresses the presence of some hunters and those greedy for her inheritance, but he must She is careful and not affected by kind words at all, as she is still affected by her bad psychological state after being left alone. Without a husband, but with her patience she will reach her goal without any worries. What is the interpretation of a dream about a dog biting Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of a dream about a dog biting a dog in a dream means that there is a near betrayal of the dreamer that will harm him, so everyone around him must take care of him. If the dog runs away From the dreamer, all his enemies appear after him, and if the dog barks, this means that he hears some conversations that are disturbing the dreamer and that require extreme care in order to get rid of anything that is harmful to him. for him. A dog bite indicates problems with opponents, so it is necessary to pay attention to their harmful behavior, because they only think something bad about this fortuneteller. If blood comes out when the dog bites the dreamer in a dream, it means that he heard some bad and disturbing news that would upset him. It makes the dreamer sad. If the fortuneteller sees that a dog was bitten and cut off his hand, this means the victory of his enemies over him, and this makes him go through a difficult psychological period, so he must help himself get out of this bad feeling that is happening. It does not lead him to any profit. The interpretation of a dream about a dog bite is important evidence of the deception and cunning that surrounds the dreamer among some people because of his extreme jealousy of him, so he should not face trust with his colleagues at work or some close people such that he is unable to control it. The vision shows that the dreamer is vulnerable

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a baby in a dream for a single woman?

preview.html: Seeing an infant in a dream for an unmarried woman expresses good news and good improvements that will befall him in the coming period. The infant is evidence of the beginning of a new life full of events and achievements. It also expresses the happiness and joy that the fortuneteller will enjoy because the male child is the link and help in the future, but sometimes it is a sign of... Some not good signs. Seeing a baby in a dream for an unmarried woman. What is the interpretation of seeing a baby in a dream for a single woman? Most often, this vision portends the girl’s marriage to a young man who has good morals and a good, innocent heart who does not know hatred and conspiracy. It also says that she will stop practicing that. Bad habits that she is accustomed to doing, which negatively affect her life and cause problems and psychological or physical problems. Some also suggest that it means that the dreamer has good qualities, in that she possesses the innocence and kindness of children, but she possesses a brave and daring heart that pushes her to do the impossible. But if she sees a child A male in her room, this means that she will find a suitable job that will provide her with a decent life full of all comforts and luxury. While whoever sees the child crawling towards her and does not know her, this indicates the presence of strong feelings in this girl’s heart towards family life, as she wants to satisfy her passion. The mother is inside her. What is Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing an infant in a dream for an unmarried woman? Ibn Sirin says that a male infant is a sign of an important event or an important relationship that will have a great impact in the future and will change many things in his life. If the boy walks towards the girl, this means that There is a good man who loves and cares for her and is ready to propose to meet her and marry her. It also heralds new beginnings in certain areas, perhaps the end of a period of fatigue and exhaustion and the return of calm and stability to her life. It also heralds obtaining a prestigious job or a good promotion that will bring a lot of money so that the girl can From living a decent, independent life. It includes a unit on the interpretation of dreams on the Egyptian website. From Google, you can see many interpretations and questions about the followers. Seeing the pregnancy of a male child in a single woman’s dream. This vision has multiple connotations ranging between good and evil, but its interpretation depends on the place and the way in which the girl is pregnant. This child. If she carries the child in her womb, this is good news for her that she will soon marry a strong and powerful man and she will have good children and wonderful offspring from him. But if she is carrying the child in her hand, this indicates that she will begin a new and different phase in her life in which all things in her life will change. Seeing a child talking in a dream with an unmarried woman. This vision expresses the dreamer’s mood for any crisis or problem he is facing at the present time, whether it is a life crisis or a disease problem. It also refers to the miracle of Christ who spoke in the cradle to show the innocence of his virgin mother, which suggests that God It will free her from the false, false reputation that was imposed on her. It is also considered a strong warning from someone surrounding the vision who has bad intentions within him and is trying to harm her and takes the opportunity to do so. Vision

title: Learn about Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the dream of eating dates

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about eating datesDates are a type of fruit that is famous for its high nutritional value and is characterized by its wonderful and beneficial taste, as it works to expel toxins from the body and protect it from diseases or vices, so in this article we review the most important things that were said about this vision, so follow us. Interpretation of a dream about eating dates What commentators say Seeing the dreamer in a dream eating dates, then leads to a lot of money and an extensive diet that he will soon obtain. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is eating dates, this indicates upcoming happiness and happy events. Seeing the dreamer in a dream eating good dates symbolizes Hearing many distinguished sermons at that time. If you saw dates in a dream and ate them and they were delicious, this means that you will earn a lot of money and pay for all your needs. If the dreamer dreams of eating dates at the time of the morning of Ramadan, it symbolizes the arrival of many good tidings, but after a while. If she sees If a woman dreams that she is eating dates with something else that does not match, this will lead to a secret divorce from her partner. If a sick person sees in a dream that he is eating dates, he is promised a quick recovery and freedom from diseases. Interpretation of a dream about eating dates by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Ibn Sirin says that eating dates in... The dream indicates the abundance of sustenance that the dreamer will gain soon. Also, seeing the dreamer eating ripe dates in a dream symbolizes earning a lot of money. Seeing a woman in a dream picking dates and eating them leads to achieving goals and realizing the great ambitions that she aspires to. If one sees dates in If a married woman sees in a dream that she is picking dates, and their taste was wonderful, then this indicates his good condition, his piety, and the good reputation he enjoys. Dates and eating them with her husband, this indicates the happy married life that she is happy with. Interpretation of a dream about eating dates for a single woman: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is eating dates, this will lead to her future marriage to a wealthy and well-intentioned man. In the event that the dreamer sees in a dream that he is eating If the dates were delicious, this indicates the good luck that he will have in the coming period. Also, seeing the dreamer in a dream eating dates means success and great successes that you will achieve. As for the dreamer who sees dates in a dream and eats them, it shows him many good things that will come to him. If You saw dates in a dream and ate them, this indicates a lot of money that you will earn soon. Interpretation of a dream about eating dates for a married woman: If a married woman sees in a dream that she is eating dates, this means that she will get a lot of halal money. Also, seeing the dreamer eating ripe dates in a dream It symbolizes a stable married life that she will be happy with. As for the woman who sees dates in a dream and eats them, this symbolizes the good offspring that she will give birth to. If you see dates in a dream and eat them with your husband, this indicates a married life.

title: Interpretation of a dream about a married woman traveling by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about travel for a married woman: It is one of the beautiful dreams that many dreamers have encountered, knowing that the interpretation of the dream is not the same, as the interpretation of a passport differs from the interpretation of a suitcase, and today through our article we will return to the most important interpretations mentioned in seeing travel in a dream. Interpretation of a dream Traveling for a married woman Traveling in a dream for a married woman is clear evidence that the dreamer has many goals that she is constantly trying to achieve, knowing that she follows all the ways and means that help her in doing so. When a married woman sees that she is planning to travel in a dream, this means that she is planning to move to a new home. , knowing that it will be the home of her dreams and it will be exactly as she wishes. If a married woman sees herself on a long trip, this indicates that she always deals with strength to escape from all the crises and problems she faces. But if the road of travel is uneven, it is an indication that her life with Her husband is not stable at all, she always suffers from problems and misunderstandings between them. But if she dreams that she is traveling to a place she loves in the dream, then it is fortunate that she will open the doors of sustenance for the dreamer and she will obtain a lot of money that guarantees the stability of her financial situation. Interpretation of a dream about a married woman traveling by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin pointed out that seeing traveling in a married woman’s dream is one of the visions that brings you many meanings and repercussions, the most prominent of which are: Traveling in a married woman’s dream is a sign that the dreamer’s life will undergo many positive changes, knowing that He will also be able to achieve all his goals. Seeing traveling in a married woman’s dream and traveling by plane is a good sign that good things are coming in her life, knowing that the dreamer generally wants to get closer to Almighty God with all good deeds. Using a car to travel in a pregnant woman’s dream is a sign To achieve the desired goals and ambitions. But if a married woman sees that she is on a dark travel path, the vision here is not good because it indicates that she is facing many problems and heartaches and that her relationship in general with her husband will not be stable. Traveling with the husband in a married woman’s dream is a sign To share with her husband in all matters. Interpretation of a dream about travel for a pregnant woman: Travel carries many interpretations, some worthy of praise and others not so, knowing that a pregnant woman feels fear when she sees traveling in a dream for fear that her child will be exposed to any harm, and here are the most important interpretations mentioned:Travel In a pregnant woman’s dream, there is evidence of the ease of childbirth, and God Almighty will grant her and her child health and well-being. However, if he sees that he is on a travel path full of many hurdles and obstacles, then the vision here indicates that childbirth will not be easy, as he will face many difficulties and there will be expected danger. On the health of the newborn. Traveling is a favorite thing in a pregnant woman’s dream. This is the opinion of Ibn Sirin, but it depends on the means of travel. If it is a car, this is a sign of easy delivery. Using an airplane is unfortunate

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing the king and sitting with him by Ibn Sirin and its meaning in good and evil

preview.html: Here in this article, the interpretation of the dream of seeing the king and sitting with him by Ibn Sirin from the Encyclopedia. Seeing the king in dreams is one of the dreams that many people may see, and many fear this vision and its interpretation. Seeing the king in a dream is one of the visions that are divided into weakness, where there is one side that shows good and the other side shows evil, and this vision varies depending on the dreamer and his circumstances, as well as his social status, and it also varies according to the form of the vision that the dreamer saw, and through this article we will learn about the interpretation Seeing the king, as well as sitting with him and talking to him, which was explained. To us by one of the leading scholars of interpretation, Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the king and sitting with him, according to Ibn Sirin. Seeing the king in a dream is basically a sign of goodness and a great sign of goodness and happiness. In the event that the fortuneteller saw the king in a dream, and the king was happy and pleased in the dream, and he laughed at Vision, this vision is a very good vision, as the fortuneteller will have abundant goodness in the coming periods, God willing. Also, seeing the king happy in a dream is also one of the visions that indicates the high status of the one who sees it, and that this person will reach a high position or a high position. And great among the people, and God knows best. Whoever sees in a dream a king who is known for his courage in reality, his vision indicates that God will grant him victory over his enemies and give him happiness and joy in his life. But seeing an unjust king or a person easily defeated by his enemies in a dream indicates the victory of the dreamer’s enemies over him. Whoever sees that he has become a king in a dream or that God Almighty has granted him a great kingship and high and great power, then this vision is great evidence that this person will gain pride and high status. Whoever sees himself as a king declares that this person will reach a high position or caliphate, but if available He has full qualities of inheritance, but he cannot pass them on to any of his children. If someone dreams that he is killing the king, this vision also indicates that this person will obtain something great that he did not expect before, and it is a great thing for the person to gain prestige and money. If he sees If one is arguing with the king or sultan, then this vision is great evidence that the dreamer will get something he really needs from the king, especially if this king is actually good. Seeing the king wearing a crown over his head in a dream means that his kingdom will not last long, The vision may indicate that the dreamer will suffer a loss in his money. Seeing the king and sitting with them Whoever sees the king in his dream and witnesses that he is sitting with him in the same place, and also talking to him, then this vision is great evidence that the dreamer and the king have great justice, and that they meet in a good matter. The dream of sitting with the king in a large palace indicates that the dreamer has reached a high position in his society. But if one sees that he is sitting with the king and eating with him, then this vision is evidence that the dreamer will gain glory and honor. It is a good vision and shows a high position and exaltation. The seer, or it is also evidence that the fortuneteller will reach a high position in the future. If someone sees in his dream that
